Description:
1 IN
My inspection of the site found multiple unsafe conditions that were breaches of health and safety law, which demonstrates a failure, by you as a contractor, to plan, manage and monitor construction work, carried out under your control, to ensure it is carried out without risks to health and safety. These included: widespread use of 230 V electrical extension leads, including one made from twin and earth cable which is unsuitable for this type of use; lack of hot or warm water in the welfare facilities; accumulation of flammable materials within the building, failures in general fire precautions

2IN
you have not provided suitable and sufficient washing facilities, including a supply of clean hot and cold or warm water, when it was reasonable practicable to do so.
